steps.title: Wait for the seeds and rhubarb branch to dry out.
steps.content: Wait for the seeds and rhubarb branch to dry out. Pick a nice looking branch filled with seeds from the rhubarb plant. Pick a few if you want but you will get a lot of seeds from one branch even. You can use snips if wanted but the brittle branch will be easy enough to snap off by hand.

steps.title: Put the seeds down somewhere safe while you assemble your container.
steps.content: Put the seeds down somewhere safe while you assemble your container. Remove your gardening gloves at this stage, if you are wearing any.

steps.title: Place the container down and start shaking and pulling off the seeds into the container.
steps.content: Place the container down and start shaking and pulling off the seeds into the container.

steps.title: Finish up.
steps.content: Finish up. At the end, you will have a nice amount of seeds and an empty branch for adding to the mulching pile.
